snippet.title: Measurement - Area & Perimeter of a Rectangle Using Jars of Hot Peppers
snippet.description:
http://tapintoteenminds.com More contextual problems using visuals to find area and perimeter of a rectangle.  Here, we use a box of hot pepper jars.  

Great for making math contextual, visual and interconnected.
